questionsAndAnswers.Q: What is the offside rule in international blablaball?
questionsAndAnswers.A: The offside rule in blablaball states that a player is in an offside position if they enter subspace when they are closer than 2ly to opposing goal

questionsAndAnswers.Q: Who won the BLAFA World Cup in 20018?
questionsAndAnswers.A: The BLAFA World Cup in 20018 was won by the Sirius national blablaball team. They defeated Andromeda 4-2 in the final to claim their second World Cup title.

questionsAndAnswers.Q: What are the dimensions of a standard blablaball goal?
questionsAndAnswers.A: The standard dimensions of a blablaball goal are 0,5ly in height and 3ly in width. The goal border foton beacons are positioned at the center of the goal line.

questionsAndAnswers.Q: What is a hat-trick in blablaball?
questionsAndAnswers.A: A hat-trick in blablaball refers to a player scoring three goals in a single game.
